params.text: Friends
Simo.
My friends

params.alt: Amagama abo nguZizo, Lele, Sisa kanye no-Ayanda.
params.title: Amagama abo nguZizo, Lele, Sisa kanye no-Ayanda.

params.text: Zizo, Lele, Sisa, Ayanda.

params.alt: Umngani wami uZizo uthanda ukudlala ibhola.
params.title: Umngani wami uZizo uthanda ukudlala ibhola.

params.text: Zizo plays football.
Lele swims.

params.alt: Umngane wami uSisa uthanda ukudlala umacashelana.
params.title: Umngane wami uSisa uthanda ukudlala umacashelana.

params.text: Sisa plays hide and seek.
Ayanda reads.
I like the things they like.

params.alt: Mina? Ngiyathanda ukwenza izinto abathanda ukuzenza.
params.title: Mina? Ngiyathanda ukwenza izinto abathanda ukuzenza.

params.text: Play football with Zizo.
Swim with Lele.
Hide and seek with Sisa.
Read with Ayanda.
Come, friend. Play with us.
Play football with us?
Swim with us?
Hide and seek with us?
Read with us?
Having fun with friends.

"Friends" credits

This work, "Friends, is a derivative of "Friends" by Zimbili Dlamini and Hlengiwe Zondi, used under CC BY. "Friends" is licensed under CC BY 4.0 by Curious Learning.


Book builder - Deborah Oduman
